title: Vacationing at Australian Internment Camps | Guest: Tim Stewart | 12/6/21
description:
Australia has camps for its citizens, but are they concentration camps, internment camps, or summer camps? Germany is enforcing some harsh restrictions on the unvaccinated citizens to fight COVID, and people are noticing the red flags. Glenn and Stu discuss the validity of COVID restrictions when ordered by untrustworthy governments. Tim Stewart, president of the U.S. Oil & Gas Association, joins Glenn to discuss the Biden oil crisis. CNN has officially let Chis Cuomo go, and Stu and Glenn discuss the possible reasons why. Jason Buttrill joins Glenn and Stu to discuss how abysmally the Biden administration has performed on the global stage. Glenn expresses how he’s more optimistic than he has been in years, and he explains why.
